Name: Rakdos Performer, High-Wire Acrobat
Traits: Nimble. The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
Actions: Multiattack. The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole. Barbed Pole. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
